reg.title: Sign Up to {{name}}
reg.input_name_tip: Enter a name or handle so people know how you’d like to be called. Your name will only be visible to others in spaces you joined.

logout.title: Log Out
logout.desc: Are you sure want to log out this account?
logout.role_changed: Detected your role has changed, would you re-login to take effect?

check_email_desc: We’ve just emailed a magic link to <0>{{email}}</0>. Once it arrives, it will be valid for 15 minutes.
guest_login_tip: Please scan QR code or sign in to send a message
github_cb_tip: Please close this window and return widget window

magic_link_expire.title: Magic link invalid or expired
magic_link_expire.desc: Please request a new magic link.
magic_link_expire.desc_close: You can close this window now.

invite_mobile.start_download: Start by downloading VoceChat mobile app
